channel.title: Server restarter SMS
channel.description: hey iv got a really good edition of voule restarter but when it works its magic it does this thing where anoth run.batch file is opened and it wont work cuz it says port 43594 is already in use and it wont shut the other once down. iv looked at these batch files that were meant to work but they all disappeared due to them being out last year ... and help guys.

item.title: Server restarter SMS
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

You can have more but you have to have different ports and please don’t quintuple post

Read full topic

item.title: Server restarter SMS
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

You can only have one batch file running a server running at the same time, otherwise you will get the error you did.

Read full topic

item.title: Server restarter SMS

item.description:
@system wrote:

lol kk np normally theres some bathc file to close the original run.bat and start a new one whilse voule executes this batch and not another run.bat[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 16, 2008, 04:06:43 PM[/size][hr][br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 16, 2008, 04:21:53 PM[/size

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 16, 2008, 05:03:19 PM[/size][hr]help please people i cud stay on for longer but it wont pay off cuz i got exams in 2 days so please help me out guys im in desperate need SMS. (Save My Server)
